relevant_findings.description: Extensive reddish-purple angio-keratomas on the eyelids, oral mucosa, arms, fingertips, abdomen, flanks, and proximal thighs. Mild-to-moderate sensorineural hearing loss, with more marked loss on the right. Mild obstructive disease noted on pulmonary function tests.

Neurological examination revealed lessening of cold sensation over the dorsal surface of the hands and forearms; no sensation of cold in lower extremities below hips. Protein excretion in urine was elevated at 5382 mg/24 h. Echocardiogram revealed mild left ventricular hypertrophy, mild aortic and tricuspid regurgitation.
